name: TopShoot Zomboid
description:
Topshoot Zomboid is a topdown vertical shooter.  Face against endless waves of zombies that become stronger with each passing one while defending yourself and the city from the raging infection as long as possible.

Survive long enough, and an intimidating foe may show up...

This game was made over a 4 week period for a school project under UOW Malaysia KDU University College.

How To Win

Defend yourself from incoming zombies and shoot all of the pesky mobs down! Survive as long as you can and pick up any collectables along the way. The more zombies you shoot down, the more extra collectables you pick up, and the higher your score.

Don't let your HP or the city's HP run ut!! Otherwise, it's a game over!

Credits

This game is created using Stencyl. All design and programming are done by me.
